item.title: The Sorrows of Young Hooman
item.description:
Just in case I face Hooman’s nasty dilemma in the future, I posted the solution to The Sorrows of Young Hooman.

( Donâ€™t Try This At Home, during our explanation to alert and educate children, teens and parents about the dangers of trained professionals. )

  • M1 uses both C1 and C2 on F1.
         ----------------
                         \----
         ------------- C2     \-
M1                C2' )         )      F1
         -------------    C1' /-
                         /----
         ----------------     C1
  • M1 uses only C2 on F2.
         ------------- C2
M1                C2' )                F2
         -------------
  • M2 uses only C1 on F1.
         ------------- C1
M2                C1' )                F1
         -------------
  • M2 uses both C2 and C1 on F2.
         ----------------
                         \----
         ------------- C1     \-
M2                C1' )         )      F2
         -------------    C2' /-
                         /----
         ----------------     C2
